summary: Days before his wedding, a Philadelphia lawyer travels to Naples in Southern Italy to settle the estate of his late brother, only to find that he has an Italian nephew who is being cared for by his maternal aunt, a cabaret singer.
cast: Clark Gable|Sophia Loren|Vittorio De Sica|Marietto|Paolo Carlini|Giovanni Filidoro|Claudio Ermelli|Bob Cunningham|Marco Tulli|Carlo Rizzo|Yvonne Monlaur|Liana Del Balzo|Mimmo Poli
title: Capri
